Description: Time series and local authority detail tables of lettings and vacancies for local authority dwellings
Name: Local Authority Lettings
Route from landing page to data: Data located by scrolling down to the 'Housing Statistics Annual Key Trends' box and clicking on  'Number of lets' in the Excel tables - Local Authority housing: field.  Scroll down to file to open the data.
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure, only 4 of the tables are required: tsLettingsFinYr tsNewLetsFinYr tsHomelessLetsFinYr tsVacanciesFinYr as the others are summary tables.
